Great game, not that much stuff to do in vanilla but if you mod it., you're going to have stuff to do for hundreds of hours, modding community is amazing. Got over 500 hours in Antistasi, and that's just one mod.

Listen folks, Arma 3—incredible game. I’ve seen a lot of games, the best games, and this one? This one is something very special. Milsim — real military, not the fake kind. Tremendous realism. Beautiful maps, like Altis—very Mediterranean, reminds me of Stratis, very classy. Some say I could have built a resort there, and they’re probably right. I will be making a golf course instead. Definitely. Tanoa? It makes me want to buy more islands to experience it in real life.

The gunplay? Phenomenal. Best I've ever seen. The modding community? Let me tell you—those people are hard-working gamers. They’ve built things in this game that make other developers look like Sleepy Squad trying to program a iPad. Absolutely horrendous. 

The editor? Tremendous. Fake news would say that Zeus sucks. Totally false. I can not imagine a more core part of a game like Zeus and the Eden Editor. Tremendous work.

It’s not for casuals. You want Fortnite? Go play Fortnite. This is for serious people—leaders, winners. Strategy, coordination, tactics—just like a real campaign. Honestly, if we used Arma 3 instead of Call of Duty, we’d have had better results. No question about it.

Buy it. Play it. Dominate. Just don’t forget to upvote and downvote patriotic mods and cowardly fake mods.

Great game, runs fine on my budget computer(for me). FPS is normally 40-60 on medium and low settings. Although my FPS would frequently be at 20-30 on the Contact DLC. I haven't played too much multiplayer at the moment so I can't really speak there. Servers seem pretty populated though. My specs are Rx 580, Ryzen 5 4500, and 16gb of ram.

short_description: Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox. Deploying a wide variety of single- and multiplayer content, over 20 vehicles and 40 weapons, and limitless opportunities for content creation, this is the PC’s premier military game. Authentic, diverse, open - Arma 3 sends you to war.
